data.job_description:
DESCRIPTION

Job Summary
At Amazon, we are working to be the most customer-centric company on earth.
Amazon is looking for passionate, versatile and curious Marketing Interns to work with us on improvement and innovation projects to support the growth of our European network. To get there, we need exceptionally talented, bright, and driven people. As an intern, you will have the opportunity to gain hands-on experience in developing and executing marketing strategies, while working alongside a collaborative team. This is a chance for you to take on meaningful projects, apply your skills, and expand your knowledge of the marketing field.
Note: You must have the right to work in the country of employment by the start date.

Key job responsibilities
Key Job Responsibilities
• This internship provides an opportunity to collaborate with cross-functional teams, demonstrate project management skills in a competitive and dynamic business climate.
• Brand strategy: Assist with implementing the global brand strategy, adapting it to the local market and support the creation of effective content and marketing assets to engage customers and prospect
• Run marketing campaigns and other growth initiatives: Assist with implementing the global brand strategy, adapting it to the local market and support the creation of effective content and marketing assets to engage customers and prospect
• Support the team in recommending and executing network improvements.
• Contribute with innovative long-term and lasting solutions beneficial for the entire team.

A day in the life
Intern Community:
• As an Amazon Intern, you'll be part of a vibrant, supportive community that empowers your growth and development. You'll collaborate with interns from around the world, networking and participating in social events to broaden your perspectives. You can also join specialized groups focused on areas like sustainability to explore your diverse interests.

Support:
• The internship program provides a robust support system, including weekly intern office hours, dedicated IT and HR support, and a program team committed to your success. This ensures you have the guidance and assistance needed to thrive.

Learning Sessions:
• Exclusive learning sessions will further enhance your skills, granting you access to Amazon's cutting-edge learning platforms and the expertise of industry leaders. These structured development opportunities will prepare you for the next step in your career.

Opportunities:
• Upon successful completion of the internship, you may be considered for a graduate role or a second internship, allowing you to continue your journey with Amazon. Additionally, you'll enjoy a competitive monthly salary, relocation support, and access to a range of employee benefits.

Internship Start Dates across the year:
• We are hiring interns to start on standardized dates from January through July.

BASIC QUALIFICATIONS
• Enrolled in a Bachelor's or Master’s Degree in Marketing, Communications or similar discipline.
• Proficient in spoken and written English and the local language of the country you are applying for (Common European Framework of Reference C1).
• Eligible to complete a full-time internship lasting between 3 to 6 months.

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS
• Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with the ability to identify process improvements and innovative solutions.
• Analytical skills and ability to work in Microsoft Excel (e.g., complex formulas, pivot tables, macros)
• Understanding of digital marketing channels (such as email, digital display, SEO, PPC.) and tools (including email, web analytics, CRM, and marketing automation platforms)
• Excellent communication and teamwork skills, able to collaborate effectively with others.
• Demonstrated curiosity, proactivity, and willingness to take on challenges in an ambiguous, fast-paced environment.

Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.

Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. If you have a disability and need a workplace accommodation or adjustment during the application and hiring process, including support for the interview or onboarding process, please visit https://amazon.jobs/content/en/how-we-hire/accommodations for more information. If the country/region you’re applying in isn’t listed, please contact your Recruiting Partner.

2026 Marketing Intern ESP Amazon

Puesto: Marketing Intern

Empresa: Amazon

Ciudad: Madrid

Área de trabajo: Marketing / Estrategia / Growth

Experiencia necesaria: No requerida (prácticas para estudiantes)

Tipo de contrato: Prácticas de 3 a 6 meses

Modalidad: Presencial

Descripción breve

Amazon busca estudiantes de Marketing o Comunicación para un rol de prácticas orientado a proyectos reales de crecimiento, marca y optimización dentro de su red europea. El puesto permite colaborar con equipos internacionales, participar en campañas, apoyar en estrategia de marca y trabajar en iniciativas de mejora basadas en datos.

Responsabilidades clave
• Participación en proyectos de estrategia de marca y adaptación al mercado local.
• Apoyo en campañas de marketing y acciones de crecimiento.
• Colaboración con equipos multidisciplinares para mejorar procesos y red de operaciones.
• Creación de contenidos y materiales de marketing.
• Identificación de mejoras y propuestas de soluciones a largo plazo.

Requisitos
• Estudiante de Grado o Máster en Marketing, Comunicación o similar.
• Inglés C1 y dominio del idioma local.
• Disponibilidad para prácticas a tiempo completo durante 36 meses.
• Habilidades analíticas, curiosidad y proactividad.
• Conocimientos de marketing digital y Excel.

Por qué es interesante

Prácticas con alto nivel de aprendizaje, comunidad internacional de interns, sesiones formativas, salario competitivo, apoyo en reubicación y posibilidad de continuidad tras finalizar el periodo.

Marketing Intern

Department: 90-893 - Subscription - Digital Acquisition Media

Employment Type: Fixed Term Contract

Location: Spain - Madrid

Reporting To: Enrique de Porres

Description
Passionate about sport marketing? Join our marketing team! As a junior marketing analyst, you will work within the Brand and Acquisition team to support marketing campaigns and partner activations in Spain.

Apply if you’re eager to work in a fast-paced environment and learn from the best team. You must have a degree in digital marketing or similar and have a good knowledge of the digital media environment. You work with passion, commitment, and responsibility to support the team in growing the business in Spain. You are a data lover, analytical mindset and want to grow in a cutting-edge technology and sport environment.

Your responsibility will be supporting the team in different marketing areas such as ATL&BTL media planning, creative assets delivery or partnership and right holders activations.

We would be grateful if you could apply with your CV in English.

What You'll Be Doing:
• Brief performance BAU assets working with media and creative teams
• Support on rights, clubs and partners activations, events or collaborations
• Become the market POC for copies localization, ensuring message consistency across product and communication
• Support on assets delivery, meeting deadlines and matching specifications
• Build post campaign reports and analysis

What You'll Bring:
• A degree in digital marketing, business or a related field
• Fluent in Spanish and English
• Understanding of digital marketing pillars
• Self-motivated with the commitment and ability to help growing our business
• Passion about sports
• Love for Excel and Powerpoint

Benefits
Benefits include access to DAZN, medical insurance fully funded by the company provided by Cigna (including access to a medical chart, premium hospitals and a reimbursement policy), refer a friend scheme, learning and development resources, opportunity for hybrid working and access to our internal speaker series and events.

**Descripción de la compañía**:
¿Te gustaría participar en la creación de un nuevo concepto de óptica en el mundo de la moda?
Miller & Marc es una marca de gafas española que está retando el status quo del mundo de la óptica con una nueva visión. Traemos transparencia, estilo de vida e innovación al sector con gafas de diseño, de calidad artesanal a precios asequibles y una experiência de compra única.
Tendrás la oportunidad de formar parte de un equipo y proyecto sólidos que ha crecido exponencialmente durante los últimos 5 años y donde puedes dejar tu huella.
• *Descripción del puesto**:
¿Quieres unirte a una empresa con propósito?
Somos Miller & Marc, la alternativa responsable que demuestra que es posible ofrecer gafas graduadas de calidad a un precio justo.
El mundo en el que vivimos nos pide que vayamos más allá de hacer negocio, por eso creemos en el negocio de impacto, dando acceso a todxs a gafas de calidad, cumpliendo con la sociedad y el planeta, mientras nos divertimos haciendo lo que más nos gusta, que veas bien con estilo. Trabajamos para que cada venta que hagamos tenga más sentido.
En Miller & Marc ofrecemos un programa de prácticas para dar soporte al departamento de Marketing y Comunicación. Si te apasionan las redes sociales, la fotografía, video y la creación creativa de contenido gráfico ¡eres la persona que buscamos! Nos ayudarás a contar qué pasa en la marca y crearás contenido, garantizando que la imagen y el posicionamiento de la marca sigan las líneas definidas por el departamento. Podrás aportar tus ideas para expresar cómo hacemos las cosas y ayudarnos a ampliar nuestra comunidad.
Ofrecemos un contrato inicial en prácticas y la posibilidad de incorporarse a plantilla más adelante en función de los resultados obtenidos con un plan de crecimiento.
Tareas a desempeñar:

- Colaboración en la estrategia de contenido junto con el equipo de Marketing.
- Generar colaboraciones con prescriptores de la marca.
- Dar soporte en la ejecución del plan de contenidos para RRSS, en sintonía con la estrategia de marca.
- Montaje y edición de videos para nuestras cuentas de RRSS.
- Funciones de Community Management.
- Ayudarás en la implementación de la estrategia editorial y serás respaldo del flujo de trabajo creativo y redacción a través de puntos de contacto (Web, CRM, Mailing, RRSS, PR, MKT online y offline).
- Trabajarás con el equipo creativo para desarrollar nuevas estrategias de activaciones para impulsar el reconocimiento de marca.
- Supervisión de reputación de marca en grupos y foros.
- Apoyo y soporte a otras tareas propias del departamento de Marketing.

Te pedimos:

- Manejo de APPs de retoque fotográfico y edición de video para uso diario. Se valorará positivamente el manejo de programas de uso profesional de edición de Foto y Video (Suite Adobe).
- Dominio alto de hojas de cálculo (Excel, Google sheets), presentaciones (PowerPoint, Google Slides).
- Control profesional de redes sociales, internet y apps móviles.
- Conocimiento en Plataforma de Ads (Google analytics, Facebook Business Manager).
- Herramientas de gestión de contenido (Later, Planoly).
- Disponibilidad para trabajar a jornada completa.
- ** Nível muy alto/bilingüe en Inglés.**
• *Perfil**:
Requisitos que debes cumplir:

- Estudiante o recién graduadx en carreras relacionadas con el Marketing y la Comunicación, ya sea ADE, Comunicación y RRPP, Periodismo, Comunicación Audiovisual o similar.
- Experiência demostrable creando comunidad en RRSS, habiendo conseguido un mínimo de 10K seguidores a nível personal / marca personal o empresa.
- Te sientes cómodx creando contenido y hablando en primera persona a la comunidad: vídeos y fotos de novedades, informar sobre un servicio, dar consejos, hablar de tendencias, etc.
- Tienes un interés especial por el mundo de la moda.
- Estás a la última en todos los nuevos formatos digitales que están de moda en el sector: Vídeos Stop motion, Directos en IG, IGTV, Tik-Tok para stories y los que nos puedas mostrar.
- Te ves trabajando en un equipo joven, moderno y con muchas ganas de hacer las cosas bien para generar un negocio de impacto positivo.
- IMPRESCINDIBLE**:Nível alto/bilingüe de inglés.

data.job_title: Paid Marketing & Business Development Internship – Language School Innovation, Madrid
data.job_description:
Location: Madrid, Spain | Type: Part-Time Internship

About the Academy
Join a dynamic language school in Madrid dedicated to delivering high-quality Spanish lessons to students of all levels. Our institution prides itself on combining immersive language education with engaging cultural and social activities, creating a vibrant learning environment. We continuously innovate our programs, offering opportunities for professional growth and hands-on experience in the education and language learning sector.

Role Overview
We are seeking a motivated Marketing Intern to contribute to the business development of our language school. This role provides an exciting opportunity to gain practical experience in digital marketing, content creation, and program promotion. You will manage and grow our social media presence on platforms like Facebook and Twitter, design and implement newsletters, develop new Spanish learning programs, enhance cultural and social initiatives, pursue new accreditations, optimise web content using SEO strategies, and translate school documentation to support our international outreach.

Key Responsibilities

Manage and expand social media accounts to increase engagement and visibility for Spanish courses.
Design, implement, and track newsletters and other marketing campaigns targeting prospective students.
Support the development and promotion of new Spanish learning programs tailored to diverse student needs.
Coordinate cultural and social activities to enhance student experiences and school reputation.
Apply SEO strategies to improve website rankings and drive organic traffic.
Translate web content, educational materials, and administrative documents for international audiences.

Candidate Requirements

Strong written and oral communication skills in English and Spanish; additional languages are a plus.
Outgoing, friendly personality with the ability to build trust with students, clients, and partners.
Highly organised with the ability to multitask, prioritise, and meet deadlines effectively.
Flexible, proactive “can-do” attitude and creative problem-solving mindset.
Commercial awareness focused on cost management and revenue maximisation.
Cultural intelligence and adaptability in diverse international environments.
Interest in digital marketing, content creation, and business development in the education sector.

By the End of Your Internship
This internship offers a comprehensive learning experience in digital marketing, business development, and content creation within an educational institution. You will leave with enhanced skills, real-world experience, and an understanding of strategic growth in a language-focused environment. Additionally, you will enjoy three free Spanish lessons per week to further improve your language proficiency.

Hands-on experience in social media management, newsletters, and content development.
Improved communication, organisational, and creative problem-solving skills.
Insight into strategic business growth and marketing initiatives for language schools.
Practical exposure to SEO techniques and digital optimisation for educational websites.

What We Offer

Part-time internship in a vibrant, student-focused language academy in Madrid.
Hands-on experience in marketing, business development, and digital content creation.
Three complimentary Spanish lessons per week to enhance your language skills.
Opportunity to work in a multicultural environment, collaborating with students and professionals from diverse backgrounds.

En Brand Dawson somos una consultora boutique de marketing y comunicación. Ahora es tu momento de entrar en un equipo que apuesta por tu talento y tu desarrollo a largo plazo.
¿Buscamos estudiantes de grado o máster en marketing y/o ADE. También valoramos perfiles de diseño gráfico, bellas artes o audiovisuales.
Valoramos más la actitud que la experiencia previa.
¿Te integrarás en proyectos reales y recibirás formación práctica en áreas clave del marketing digital:
~ Creación de contenidos creativos.
~ SEO y SEM: estrategia y ejecución.

data.job_title: Paid Digital Marketing & Social Media Internship – Leading DMC in Madrid
data.job_description:
Join a Leading Destination Management Company (DMC) in Madrid – Specializing in Spain and Portugal for the American Market
Are you passionate about marketing and looking to gain hands-on experience in the tourism sector? This paid marketing internship offers a unique opportunity to immerse yourself in the world of digital marketing and social media management while working with a leading Destination Management Company (DMC) based in Madrid, focusing on Spain and Portugal as key destinations for the American market.
As a marketing intern, you will be an integral part of the team, engaging in diverse marketing activities aimed at promoting these exciting destinations. You will get the chance to develop your skills in database management, working with customer and prospect data to optimize marketing campaigns and target the right audience. You’ll also gain experience in creating and sending campaigns and newsletters, ensuring that the content reaches the appropriate audience effectively and on time.
Your role will also include comprehensive social media management where you will be responsible for helping to grow and engage a vibrant online community. You’ll have the opportunity to curate and schedule posts, track social media analytics, and contribute creative ideas that will shape the company’s presence on platforms like Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter.
In addition to the tasks mentioned, you will have the chance to contribute creatively and autonomously to various marketing projects. This could include brainstorming new ideas for promotional campaigns, analyzing current trends in the tourism industry, and supporting the development of content that resonates with international travelers. You’ll work closely with a team of marketing professionals, gaining insights into the intricacies of working in the tourism industry and contributing to the company’s growth.
By the end of this internship, you will have gained practical experience in key areas of digital marketing, social media strategy, and database management. You’ll become proficient in essential marketing tools such as Mailchimp (Mail Chain) for email marketing campaigns, Canva for creating visually engaging content, and PTT (PowerPoint) for creating presentations and reports. Additionally, you will further develop your skills with Microsoft Office applications, ensuring you’re well-prepared for a successful career in marketing.
This internship is ideal for English speakers with a background in marketing studies, offering an exciting opportunity to work in an international and dynamic environment. A good level of Spanish (at least B1) is required, along with proficiency in Mailchimp, Canva, PTT, and Microsoft Office. We’re looking for someone who is creative, autonomous, and ready to contribute to a dynamic team. If you’re eager to apply your knowledge, develop new skills, and make a real impact on the company’s marketing efforts, this internship is the perfect fit for you.
What You Will Gain:

Hands-on experience in digital marketing and social media management.

Knowledge of the tourism industry and how it caters to American travelers.

Proficiency in using marketing tools like Mailchimp, Canva, and PowerPoint.

The opportunity to contribute to and create marketing content.

An understanding of database management and email marketing strategies.

Collaboration with an international team and exposure to global marketing trends.

Real-life experience that will enhance your marketing career prospects.

If you’re a proactive, creative individual who is excited to contribute to the success of a well-established Destination Management Company in one of Europe’s most vibrant cities, apply now to join our team in Madrid!

data.job_title: AWWG Marketing Intern (FIXED TERM - 6 MONTHS) - AWWG Madrid
data.job_description:
Who We Are...

At AWWG, transformation is embedded in our DNA. Founded in 1998 under the name of Pepe Jeans Group. With headquarters in Madrid, Spain, and design offices in London and Nice, this global fashion group integrates the iconic brands Pepe Jeans London, Hackett, and Façonnable. AWWG also has the master franchisee and agency for Tommy Hilfiger (Spain and Portugal) as well as the agency for Calvin Klein, DKNY, Donna Karan, and Karl Lagerfeld (Spain and Portugal).

AWWG currently has over 3,500 points of sale, a presence in 86 countries globally, and a workforce of more than 4,500 employees of 79 nationalities. As a global retail platform, the Group is committed to constant evolution and to creating brand equity by transformation, in line with the changes, challenges, and inherent needs of the industry. The three iconic brands are unified as part of AWWG while each maintains its own strong DNA and values, built up over thirty years in the retail sector with strong design teams, product development, and brand enhancement. AWWG continuously evolves, pushing the limits and defying the status quo to create value through innovative, aspirational, and sustainable products that prioritize excellence, craftsmanship, differentiation, and quality.

The project

Support the alignment of the 11 licences' marketing calendars with PJ, Hackett, and Faconnable GTM strategies, contributing to a smooth integration across brand priorities.

What will the role entail?
• Assist in the planning, organization, and follow-up of marketing initiatives to ensure partners receive timely and accurate support.
• Support coordination with internal marketing teams on licences campaigns, product imagery requests, PR initiatives, social media activations, and other cross-functional marketing tasks.
• Help maintain consistency between licence activities and AWWG's overall marketing strategy and brand positioning.
• Assist in tracking key campaigns end-to-end (rights, partner requirements, layouts, budgets, invoicing) and ensure documentation is up to date.
• Support monitoring how licences deploy their marketing investments, helping identify activities that drive sell-out and strengthen brand visibility.
• Help review partner representation of AWWG brands across trade shows, POS materials, e-commerce, newsletters, and social media to ensure accurate and impactful visibility.
• Assist the graphic team and partners in the approval process for packaging and labelling, ensuring alignment with AWWG's brand guidelines.
• Contribute to monitoring partner performance versus forecasts and business plans, identifying potential risks or opportunities with guidance from the team.
• Support the follow-up of partners' royalty payments to ensure completeness and accuracy.
• Help prepare materials, presentations, and data for quarterly Marketing & Business Update meetings with partners.

What do we offer?
• Great international working environment.
• Remote Work on Fridays.
• Flexible working hours.
• Discount on the brands of the Group.

REQUIREMENTS
• Bachelor's Degree or higher in Communication, Marketing or similar.
• High level of English and Spanish (min. C1). Other languages will be valued.
• Expertise in Microsoft Excel and Powerpoint.

Our friend from Looking are looking for a motivated and dynamic individual to join their team on a part-time basis. The Sales & Marketing Intern will work close with the sales team to scale lead acquisition and improve the whole sales funnel.
• *Responsibilities**:
Contribute to the optimization of our lead capture initiatives: SEA, landing pages, SEO etc.
Contribute to the improvement of our sales process by developing initiatives that save time and efforts to our team and customers.
Respond to inbound inquiries
Maintain active engagement with leads through follow-up communications to qualify prospects for hand off to the salesperson.
Accurately process leads, deals and appointments in HubSpot.
Provide support to the sales team.
Working conditions
Salary according to qualification and experience.
Opportunities to take responsibility and grow professionally in the sales role.
Flexibility to work from home and flexible working hours.
Benefits while working at Lógicos
Flexible work environment
Attractive phantom shares program for long term employees
Young and multicultural team, with a cool and fair work environment
Fast growing paced company, with opportunities for internal promotion
Pet friendly
Variety of fruits
• *Requirements**:
Full professional fluency in English and Spanish is a must for this role
Excellent communication skills, both written and oral
Ability to multi-task, prioritize and manage time effectively
Ability to work independently and to take the initiative
Some knowledge of marketing tools and dynamics.
High energy and motivation We are looking for an entrepreneurial spirit and willingness to learn instead of specific experience
